医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
对于不产生乳糖酶的成年人来说，增加牛奶摄入量可降低 2 型糖尿病的风险最近发表在《自然代谢》杂志上的一项研究的研究人员调查了乳糖酶非持续性个体中牛奶摄入量与 2 型糖尿病之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Increased-milk-intake-linked-with-a-decreased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-adults-who-do-not-生产乳糖酶.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Increased-milk-intake-linked-with-a-decreased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-adults-who-do-not-生产乳糖酶.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9d8d7e7-38cb-414e-b8ac-51e0ceeff385 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:49:00 -0500 Increased milk intake associated with a decreased risk of type 2 diabetes in adults who do not produce lactase
研究表明社交媒体如何加剧不快乐和物质主义您找不到比社交媒体更容易与他人进行比较的地方了。这对你不好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-how-social-media-fuels-unhappiness-and-materialism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-how-social-media-fuels-unhappiness-and-materialism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f793f33b-94a7-46fd-ac89-a06fea1c5f66 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:29:33 -0500 Study shows how social media fuels unhappiness and materialism
WFIRM 领导了价值 4000 万美元的再生医学计划，为伤者及其他患者提供服务维克森林再生医学研究所是维克森林大学医学院的一部分，已被选为武装部队再生医学研究所 (AFIRM) 联盟的领导者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/WFIRM-leads-2440M-rogenic-medicine-initiative-for-the-wounded-and-beyond.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/WFIRM-leads-2440M-rogenic-medicine-initiative-for-the-wounded-and-beyond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d033624-7eb0-45fe-be49-84d1943e498d Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:23:40 -0500 WFIRM leads $40M regenerative medicine initiative for the wounded and beyond
微重力可能使太空蔬菜更容易滋生细菌生菜和其他绿叶蔬菜是健康、均衡饮食的一部分；即使对于执行任务的宇航员来说也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Microgravity-may-make-space-veggies-more-prone-to-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Microgravity-may-make-space-veggies-more-prone-to-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e3f5993-8cd8-402a-93cc-54fd8b513461 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:20:03 -0500 Microgravity may make space veggies more prone to bacteria
脑组织变薄可在症状出现前十年预测痴呆症德克萨斯大学健康科学中心的研究人员表示，在患有痴呆症的人中，一条称为皮质灰质的脑组织会变薄，这似乎是该疾病出现症状前 5 到 10 年的准确生物标志物。安东尼奥（也称为 UT Health San Antonio）报道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Thinning-brain-tissue-predicts-dementia-up-to-a-decade-before-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Thinning-brain-tissue-predicts-dementia-up-to-a-decade-before-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43609543-0cbd-437b-8a0d-3fd82b7a3dbf Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:06:11 -0500 Thinning brain tissue predicts dementia up to a decade before symptoms
研究强调了驱动现代缓步动物生态的复杂遗传景观缓步动物可能是大自然的最终幸存者。虽然这些微小的、近乎半透明的动物很容易被忽视，但它们代表了一个多样化的群体，已成功地在包括南极洲在内的每个大陆的淡水、海洋和陆地环境中定居。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-highlights-the-complex-genic-landscape-that-drives-modern-tardigrade-ecology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-highlights-the-complex-genic-landscape-that-drives-modern-tardigrade-ecology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75dd97b0-f999-4c6a-98e3-3f0115fb8779 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 12:58:29 -0500 Study highlights the complex genetic landscape that drives modern tardigrade ecology
利用尖端技术揭示隐藏的结核病风险一种研究结核病（TB）从感染到疾病进展的新方法已经识别出并治疗了罹患该疾病的风险较高的人群，而目前的检测方法则无法做到这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Unveiling-hidden-TB-risk-with-cutting-edge-techniques.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Unveiling-hidden-TB-risk-with-cutting-edge-techniques.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c5645c2-209a-4dc4-b137-3e66df9e8d26 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 12:32:51 -0500 Unveiling hidden TB risk with cutting-edge techniques
罗格斯大学的研究人员制定了提高前列腺癌治疗效果的策略罗格斯大学的研究人员可以预测哪些患者将从一种流行的前列腺癌药物中受益，并制定了一种可能使治疗效果更长的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Rutgers-researchers-devise-strategy-to-boost-prostate-cancer-treatment-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Rutgers-researchers-devise-strategy-to-boost-prostate-cancer-treatment-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77f0f241-9b0f-494c-b6c5-1c80d05fa6d9 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 12:26:30 -0500 Rutgers researchers devise strategy to boost prostate cancer treatment efficacy
研究评估与低风险前列腺癌主动监测选择相关的因素由于低风险前列腺癌不太可能扩散或影响生存，专家和指南建议积极监测，其中包括定期监测，从而避免或延迟手术或放射治疗等治疗及其改变生活的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-evaluates-factors-linked-with-selection-of-active-surveillance-for-low-risk-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-evaluates-factors-linked-with-selection-of-active-surveillance-for-low-risk-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a35c3671-68c9-4a54-9d36-8cef337d9c4c Mon, 22 Jan 2024 12:22:57 -0500 Study evaluates factors associated with selection of active surveillance for low-risk prostate cancer
科学家展示了在小鼠细胞中产生 SARS-CoV-2 受体蛋白的方法美国能源部 (DOE) 布鲁克海文国家实验室和哥伦比亚大学的一个科学家团队展示了一种方法，可以大量生产 SARS-CoV-2（导致 COVID-19 的病毒）表面结合的受体人体细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-demonstrate-way-to- Produce-SARS-CoV-2-receptor- Protein-in-mouse-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-demonstrate-way-to- Produce-SARS-CoV-2-receptor- Protein-in-mouse-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa58deed-d6f1-4f5e-ac93-574d331900a2 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 12:16:21 -0500 Scientists demonstrate way to produce SARS-CoV-2 receptor protein in mouse cells
